title: Cinch Men's Carter Relaxed Fit Jean
description: Medium Denim Wash Features Hand Sanding, Tacking, And Fading Accents
Relaxed fit through waist, hip, thigh, and knee

Carter is the latest addition to cinch's fashion basic denim and has become one of our most requested jeans. Carter is a mid-rise jean with a relaxed waist, hip, thigh, and knee. Copper oxide cinch embossed rivets, non-ratcheting zipper slider and double stitched reinforced felled seam on the inside of the legs to eliminate chafing. This boot cut jean ends with a 19 7/8 leg opening. It's one of the best jeans to show off your favorite boots. The five-pocket, 100 percent cotton denim is pre-shrunk and fits as good tomorrow as it does today
